description:
It would be nice for the various programs to support the --flagfile or --config-file formats transparently.
Currently for example one needs to run nova-manage with --config-file=/etc/nova/nova.conf
if that file in is ini format, otherwise it will silently fail and use defaults.
title: new config format requires explicit --config-file option
